name: next-js-learning-monorepo
description: A full-stack Next.js application with AWS CDK infrastructure

scripts.install:all: npm run frontend:install && npm run infra:install
scripts.build:all: npm run frontend:build && npm run infra:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/.next infrastructure/node_modules infrastructure/cdk.out infrastructure/dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development'
